title: Best of The Herd: 01/04/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/04/2019
description:
Colin thinks the idea that James Harden is the best offensive player of all time is laughable.  He says if you still doubt Andy Reid just look at his coaching tree and how much impact it will have on these NFL playoffs.  Plus, Kevin Clark of The Ringer makes his wild card weekend picks and disagrees with Colin on every single one of them. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
